titles.title: NLRB Stability Act
NLRB Stability Act
A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to enhance the stability of orders of the National Labor Relations Board by limiting nonacquiescence of the Board, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
